Template.Name: Shelly plug S MQTT
Template.Description:
To enable MQTT in browser interface go to Internet and Security / Advanced - Developer Settings, tick "Enable action execution via MQTT" and fill out "Server" input by formula {MQTT broker IP address}:{port}" and press SAVE.
To find Device ID in browser interface go to Settings / Device Info / Device ID. It is the first string of characters (not in the brackets!)
